CustomField.description: The Amount of Days the Profiled checkbox will stay checked on the Account. Will be overridden by the Run Effective Date of an open opportunity of the corresponding record type
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Amount of Days the Profiled checkbox will stay checked on the Account. Will be overridden by the Run Effective Date of an open opportunity of the corresponding record type
CustomField.label: ProfiledExpirationDays
